detail.summary: Web application for a thesis search system for computer science students KU CSC Implements TF-IDF technique in measure word importance relative to search queries, and retrieval of relevant documents and use word processing with PythaiNLP
Designed and developed an article app (mobile app) with Flutter and Rest API with Laravel MySQL.
Designed and developed a lottery buy-sale web application with Angular and Slim framework and MySQL.

projectName: Web Application for admissions undergraduate students
subject: Web Technology and Web Service

detail.summary: Designed and developed an admissions web application for undergraduate at Kasetsart University Chalermphrakiat Sakon Nakhon Province Campus with HTML, CSS, Javascript, Jquery, PHP, MySQL.
